edu.umd.cs.psl.application.topicmodel.reasoner.function

Class NegativeLogFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umd.cs.psl.reasoner.function.FunctionSum
      • edu.umd.cs.psl.application.topicmodel.reasoner.function.NegativeLogFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FunctionTerm, java.lang.Iterable<FunctionSummand>

    public class NegativeLogFunction
extends FunctionSum
    Computes minus the sum of the logs of the terms of FunctionSummands. In the sum, the logarithms are multiplied by the coefficients of the FunctionSummands.

    • Field Summary
